name: Learning-Path-Designing-Web-APIs-Examples
tagline: Links to example code downloads for Learning Path: Designing Web APIs
body:
# Learning Path: Designing Web APIs
---

## Designing APIs for the Web, by Mike Amundsen
### To download example files from this video course, [click here] (https://github.com/apiacademy/designing-apis-for-the-web).

## Building Web APIs with Flask, by Miguel Grinberg
### To download example files from this video course, [click here] (https://github.com/miguelgrinberg/oreilly-flask-apis-video).

## PHP Web Services, by Lorna Mitchell
### To download example files from this video course, [click here] (https://github.com/lornajane/video-php-web-services).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
